content: Experience the ancient and magical city with 360-degree views from 100 meters above the ground
Use the free telescopes to see as far as Osaka on a clear day
Appreciate the night view from the bar 45 meters above ground where you can enjoy drinks and coffee
Explore souvenir shops, a public bathhouse, restaurants, and sky lounges
Enjoy various amenities inside the tower, including a large bathhouse plus different kinds of restaurants and stores
